author: Jasson Garcia
comment: This app is a Joke. I thought that TD Bank had an ugly UI... And then I saw this. The Apple one looks okay. But this, eww. You couldn't find an uglier set up for the PIN to sing in? And then no finger print scanner? Do you guys need an Android Developer? When should I expect an update on this app? Jesus!  Update:02/26/18  New update, and the same ugly UI. It hurts my eyes.

Would love to know what tech company your using for app development. .Could you have possibly made this app any worse?..Oh Yea let's update it !..Straight up stuck on stupid..This reflects so poorly on your company it'd embarrassing

author: Bobby Yacuzzo
comment: The Android implementation is terrible. I'm on the cleanest form of Android and it always has trouble logging me in. It just loads and loads. In contrast, my iPhone app works great. Get it together CB, the millions of ppl using Android deserve better, including Google(Android) Pay support.

author: April Miles
comment: I love the app csuse its easy for me to check my balances also pay bills with. I gave it a four only because I set it up so I could use a pin to get on instead of my long password and it worked for a little bit then wouldn't work again.

author: Dan Sinagra
comment: App has always been great and reliable. But for the past week it no longer remembers the 4 digit PIN you set up. Not a big deal but a little frustrating when all other banking apps I use have also made the transition to fingerprint log in! Three weeks later still no fix.

author: Breanna Novick
comment: Have used this app for a long as they've had one without major issues. Just recently updated it, won't even open. Even uninstalled and reinstalled, still won't work. I've been contemplating switching banks, this just gave me more reason. Totally useless.

author: Jon Menzemer
comment: This app always has something wrong with it. Widget isn't updating and I keep trying to get it to use my pin after it was already set but won't work. Get some better people working on this please. Also set it up to use fingerprints. Yall are far behind

author: Emily Matthews
comment: Passable if you can manage to log in. Extremely buggy. Crashes regularly. Expect to attempt login several times before the home page loads.
Trust me, Navigant us way better. Citizens is a trash bank and horrible costumer service. The app is so bad.

author: T.Allen Freeland
comment: I like it even though it has a few new glitches. Won't save my Enable PIN setting and the best part - the Contact Us link doesn't work!

author: Ryan Cadd
comment: Slow, buggy, and constantly crashing. Almost always have to close and reopen the app to get it to work properly. When it actually works it's very convenient. Galaxy S8

author: Amanda Cook
comment: Can you fix the pin login issue? No matter how many times I set it up as my preferred way to log in, it reverts back to password EVERY time.

author: Mark Baldassari
comment: Can't even get through the enrollment. Won't let me select 3 security questions. Tried to do it through the web page  to face the same exact malfunction. Is this real life?? FIX THIS FRIGGING APP OR IM GOING TO B.O.A.!

author: Sean Grimes
comment: Still no finger print support despite being available on iOS for years. Mobile deposit takes photo too fast producing a consistently blurry photo. Pin unlock doesn't use a real keyboard. Shows me the same popup asking if I want to use widgets every time I log on despite repeatedly hitting not now. This app is a disaster. Paired with the archaic password policy for online accounts it really makes one wonder how secure the online services really are.

author: TK Kelly
comment: Needs a lot of improvement. Need to force close and reopen many times. PIN does not work on 8.1. No fingerprint option. Feels like a very old app that hasn't improved with accompanying tech.

author: Matthew Vaughn
comment: I am trying to enroll to start using the app and it won't let me get past the 3 question step. Every time I hit to select the question it keeps telling me mobile unavailable try again later. So I can't even use the app. Fix it and maybe I will try another time.

author: Kathryn Smith
comment: This bank needs to get on board... If they don't soon after thirty years... I'm gone... where is the ability to use Samsung and Android pay?

author: Jason Heapes
comment: Would be a five star if the recent update didn't remove the capability to login using a pin on my galaxy s7. Sent feedback a month ago still no update fix. Better off using the browser to login

author: shane miller
comment: Outdated design leaves it trailing behind most banking apps. Still no fingerprint login support which is standard on many banking apps.

author: Danielle Marie
comment: The app does not show how they get your current account balance I don't care for the way it is displayed not enough detail I'm alway feeling robbed with this thisbank anyway

author: Ray Cravetz
comment: App crashes and takes forever to log in. Provides inaccurate balances, resulting in fees and defeating the purpose of having an app.  I am considering switching banks just to get an app that works.

author: Terrie Lightfoot
comment: After the latest update I can no longer use my PIN to sign in. Then I'll go in and enable it, but it keeps disabling itself. WTH?

Have not been able to do a mobile deposit in a while. Also won't keep my Pin access enabled no matter how many times I turn it on. Also doesn't save the bill pay status of bills paid thru the app, still have to go online via computer to file bills.

author: David Richards
comment: Widget doesn't update anymore, but wait... I forgot... It does when it feels like it. No comment on Android pay.   Too bad Gardner MA branch closed. Still nothing close to Leominster Area. Disappointing

author: Dagor Braggolach
comment: Most recent update causing various functions to take a long time to load. Unable to access mobile deposit, just spins

author: Luis Rivera
comment: I love  my bank and the people that work there because they're so nice and helpful. plus I love the app because  it's so much easier to pay bills or credit cards and keep track of your account

author: Anthony Nielsen
comment: This is the worst banking app I've ever used in addition to the worst bank I've ever worked with (sparing Wells Fargo and Citibank)  Update 2/15/18 still the worst bank and worst banking app I've ever used.

author: Kellie Cole
comment: No Touch ID for Android. No Samsung Pay yet. This bank is SERIOUSLY behind the times from other banks. No wonder they are hurting for business.

author: Keith Stamos
comment: There is always something wrong with the app after updates. I currently cant even see my accounts

author: Ron Levy
comment: Worst logging in experience of all time, constantly forces me to reset my password all year.

author: Claude Desinord
comment: App barely does what it should. Refuses to remember pin number set.

author: Lester Stillson
comment: Goes offline or down for maintenance more than anything... figure it out citizens

author: Miranda Distorted
comment: This app opens 1 in every 6 times. It's so unreliable.

author: Henry G
comment: The app is ok for the basics. Needs more features for a modern banking app, such as biometric security, mobile payments, 2 factor authentication. Mobile deposits implementation could be better.

author: Trinity Whitehead
comment: Was functional for a while, then the mobile deposit stopped working.

author: Jeremy Miller
comment: Great app, would be better if you could sign in with fingerprint recognition(where applicable).

author: Gene Carriere
comment: Poor customer service...no response to my 4 inquiries for more than a week and counting!

author: Theo Collins
comment: App is good only problem I have it takes too long to open after you put your pin in

author: Dion Adamy
comment: Mobile Deposit was broken in a recent update.
The PIN login is not working. I activate it, log out, when reopening it asks for my password. This function was great. Please fix it.
